title: Dish, 1920–40
markings: In center on the bottom of dish, a black triangle containing a horizontal line with a rising perpendicular arrow.  Below, "DEK. 256".
description: Triangular shaped dish with curved edges sitting on three short feet.  Light gray ground speckled with lavender.  Solid lavender edge dotted with brown that runs into the creases that run from the triangle's points. Off-center abstract design of three brown wavy lines, five straight crossing brown lines, and four blue dots.

tombstone.epitaph:
Dish, 1920–40.
1920–40. Glazed earthenware. Gift of Victor Wiener. 1996-18-3.
